list.name: getModuleIdsByType
list.sqlitem: select id from module where type = ? order by update_at desc

map.name: getModuleIdByUrlAndType
map.sqlitem: select id from module where url=? and type = ? order by update_at desc

list.name: getModuleIdsAll
list.sqlitem: select id from module where 1 = 1 order by update_at desc
